I'm the Atlas Manager - I'm here to save MDB some $$$.
 I pause clusters in the SA-NA-West organization, nightly at 8 PM PST.

Remember that clusters whose *name* starts with *MC-* will not be paused.
 Alternatively, visit <https://stitch-statichosting-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/5dadebe0dc8c27c935ba2ebe/index.html|this page> to add your cluster to the whitelist so that I will not pause it during my nightly run.
Friendly reminder to resume any clusters shown above that you might need today!
